channel.title: History on Krita Site
channel.description: Recent content in History on Krita Site

item.title: Krita Foundation
item.description: Krita Foundation The Krita project was started by the KDE community in 1998. Krita is still part of the KDE community: all Krita contributors are KDE community members!

item.title: License
item.description: License for usage Krita Application Krita is licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL), version 3. This license gives you the following rights:

item.title: Mascot
item.description: Kiki the Mascot Kiki the Cyber Squirel, or just Kiki, is Krita’s mascot. We chose a squirrel because the word “krita” means “squirrel” in Albanian.

item.title: Press
item.description: Press Krita is the full-featured free digital painting studio for artists who want to create professional work from start to end.
